title: Stem Cell Research and the Expanding Universe - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/20/17
itunes:title: Stem Cell Research and the Expanding Universe - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/20/17
description:
George Noory, guest Robert Lanza and a caller discuss new medical breakthroughs linked to stem cell research, as well as the theory of an expanding universe.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
